price: Enti hwan paa na ͻyε onipa bͻneni kyεn obia otwa nkontompo to Nyankopͻn soͻ na ͻfa Nokorε no atorͻsεm wͻ εberε a (Nokorε no) aba ne hͻ? Enti Amanehunu gya nnyε fie mma boniayεfoͻ no?
arabic: ۞ فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ إِذۡ جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faman aẓlamu mimman kadhaba ʿalā al-lahi wakadhaba bil-ṣid'qi idh jāahu alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lil'kāfirīna
